channel.title: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

image.title: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

item.title: Where Did We Go Wrong With Ethereum Scaling?
item.dc:creator: Avi Zurlo
item.media:keywords: modular blockchains, ethereum rollups, ethereum fragmentation

item.title: Coinbase Accuses U.S. SEC of Breaking the Law in Rejecting Crypto Rulemaking
item.dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
item.description: Coinbase Inc. (COIN) has accused the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission of ignoring the law when it rebuffed the company's formal petition for crypto rules, according to a filing Monday in the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit.

media:content.media:description: Coinbase is accusing Chair Gary Gensler's U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission of improper procedure in its handling of crypto oversight. (Jesse Hamilton/CoinDesk)

item.title: Crypto Is (and Isn’t) Money
item.dc:creator: Ethan Buchman

item.title: XRP Jumps 20% After Mysterious Binance Transfers as Crypto Rally Expands to Laggards
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: The rally could be a sign of traders rotating some of their capital to tokens that haven't moved yet.
item.media:keywords: XRP price, XRP rally, Ripple price

item.title: ‘Greater Fools Are Watching’: Bitcoin Is Here to Stay, Elites Admit
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kuhn

item.title: Solana DeFi's KMNO Airdrop Sparked Outrage. Kamino Responded With Changes
item.dc:creator: Danny Nelson
item.description: Kamino is trying to quell days of angst after it revealed key details for April's KMNO airdrop.

media:content.media:description: Solana banner in Austin, Texas (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)

item.title: VanEck Temporarily Cuts Bitcoin ETF Fee to Zero After Lagging in Assets
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: HODL, VanEck’s spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), has so far attracted a little over $305 million in assets, which is far below most of its competitors.
item.media:keywords: VanEck bitcoin ETF, HODL, VanEck bitcoin etf fee, VanEck crypto, spot bitcoin etfs

media:content.media:description: VanEck will temporarily cut the management fee to zero for its spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), HODL, as its assets are well below some of its competitors. (Markus Winkler/Pixabay)

item.title: 'Bitcoin Is Going to Eat Gold': MicroStrategy’s Michael Saylor
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: Appearing on CNBC after his company on Monday announced the purchase of an additional 12,000 of bitcoin {{BTC]], MicroStrategy (MSTR) Executive Chairman Michael Saylor said the crypto will be a much more valuable asset than gold in the future.
item.media:keywords: MicroStrategy bitcoin holdings, Michael saylor, Michael saylor bitcoin

media:content.media:description: MicroStrategy Executive Chairman Michael Saylor said bitcoin will be a much more valuable asset than gold in the future. (Photo by Marco Bello/Getty Images)

item.title: With Mastercard, MetaMask Tests First Blockchain-Powered Payment Card
item.dc:creator: Ian Allison
item.description: It would be "the first ever truly decentralized web3 payment solution," allowing users to spend their crypto "on everyday purchases, everywhere cards are accepted," according to marketing materials CoinDesk reviewed.

item.title: Bernstein Is 'Now More Convinced' That Bitcoin Will Hit $150K After Massive Rally
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: Spot bitcoin ETF inflows have surpassed expectations, the broker said in the report.

item.title: BRC-20 Creator Domo Addresses Thorny Governance Issues With New 'Lead Maintainer' Appointments
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: Governance on BRC-20 and on Bitcoin general is often a thorny subject, as highlighted at the start of this year when Ordinals marketplace UniSat and Domo came into a potential conflict.

item.title: We Have to Make It Easier For People to Own Crypto Directly (Not Just With ETFs)
item.dc:creator: Rohit Wad
item.description: The success of “digital gold” ETFs reminds us to continue improving accessibility and lower entry barriers to bitcoin and Web3, says Binance’s CTO Rohit Wad.

item.title: U.S. President Again Proposes Crypto Mining Tax, 'Wash Sale Rule' for Digital Assets in New Budget
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: The U.S. president's budget proposal for 2025 suggests the administration can reduce the national deficit by nearly $10 billion just by "modernizing rules" that include cryptocurrencies.

media:content.media:description: U.S. President Joe Biden during a State of the Union address in March 2024. (Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images)

item.title: Near Protocol's Token Almost Doubles in a Week, Ahead of Nvidia's AI Conference
item.dc:creator: Oliver Knight, Aoyon Ashraf
item.description: Layer-1 blockchain NEAR's native token {{NEAR}} has experience doubled since March 5, with hype surrounding Nvidia's upcoming annual conference driving AI-related tokens to the upside.

media:content.media:description: NEAR rises ahead of Nvidia conference (Gerard Siderius/Unsplash)

item.title: Blockchain Builder Eclipse Labs Raises $50M Ahead of Layer-2’s Mainnet Debut
item.dc:creator: Danny Nelson
item.description: Eclipse mixes tech from Ethereum, Solana and other blockchains.

item.title: Crypto Funds Weekly Inflows Surge to Record of $2.7B
item.dc:creator: Lyllah Ledesma
item.description: Bitcoin remained the focus of investors seeing $2.8 billion worth of inflows.

item.title: Bitcoin’s Market Cap Jumps to $1.4T, Surpassing Silver
item.dc:creator: Lyllah Ledesma
item.description: Bitcoin rose to a record high on Monday, fuelled by continued positive momentum of spot bitcoin ETFs.

item.title: Tether's USDT To Launch on Celo
item.dc:creator: Lyllah Ledesma
item.description: The USDT integration aims to boost cross-border payments and peer-to-peer transactions in developing regions.

item.title: Donald Trump Sounds More Constructive on Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Oliver Knight
item.description: Former United States president Donald Trump commented on bitcoin {{BTC}} during an interview on CNBC, stating that he's not sure he'd want to take bitcoin away if he became president.

item.title: BlockFi’s Zac Prince Leaves Crypto, Joins Real Estate Tech Startup Re Cost Seg
item.dc:creator: Sam Reynolds
item.description: Prince says he considered starting a new company in the crypto space, but wants something with a regular work week and lacks the octane and volatility of the industry.
item.media:keywords: BlockFi, Real Estate, Real Estate Tech, Zac Prince, Re Cost Seg

item.title: MicroStrategy Acquires 12,000 More BTC With Convertible Senior Notes Proceeds
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: The software firm, founded by staunch bitcoin advocate Michael Saylor, now holds 205,000 BTC worth around $14.7 billion.

media:content.media:description: Michael Saylor, executive chairman of MicroStrategy (Michael.com)

item.title: First Mover Americas: Bitcoin Surpasses $71K, Reaches All-Time High
item.dc:creator: Lyllah Ledesma, Omkar Godbole
item.description: The latest price moves in bitcoin (BTC) and crypto markets in context for March 11, 2024. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.
item.media:keywords: Bitcoin, First Mover, Markets, Derivatives, Trading Volume

item.title: Bitcoin CME Futures' Open Interest Reaches Record High of $10B
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: Notional open interest refers to the dollar value of the active or open futures contracts at a given time.

media:content.media:description: Open interest in CME bitcoin futures. (Velo Data)

item.title: Unibot Tanks 33% After Ending Collaboration With Solana Group
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: From trading at a high of $77 at the start of the European morning on Monday, UNIBOT sank 40% to around $45.51 before rebounding slightly.

item.title: Crypto Market Could Face Some Short-Term Headwinds, Coinbase Says
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: Positive drivers such as spot ETF inflows are likely to meet some important macro and technical headwinds in the coming weeks, the report said.

item.title: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest Sold Nearly $150M Coinbase Shares Last Week
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: ARK Invest aims to have no individual holding surpass a 10% weighting of an ETF's value, making such large sell offs necessary when an asset surges in value.

media:content.media:description: Ark Invest CEO Cathie Wood (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)

item.title: Bitcoin Surge Sees Crypto Trading Volumes Exceed the Stock Market in South Korea
item.dc:creator: Shaurya Malwa
item.description: The KOSPI trading volume recorded 11.4794 trillion won on Mar.8, compared to nearly 12 trillion won on local crypto exchanges on Sunday.

item.title: Indian Crypto Investment Platform Mudrex to Offer U.S. Bitcoin ETFs to Indian Investors
item.dc:creator: Amitoj Singh
item.description: Indian cryptocurrency investment platform Mudrex will offer U.S. spot-bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to Indian investors, both institutions and retailers, CEO and co-founder Edul Patel said.
item.media:keywords: Edul Patel, Mudrex, India, Spot-Bitcoin ETFs, Bitcoin ETFs, U.S., RBI

item.title: UK’s FCA Opens the Door for Institutional Investors to Build Crypto-Backed ETN Market
item.dc:creator: Will Canny
item.description: Products would be available to professional investors while retail consumers remain banned, the regulator said.

item.title: Bitcoin Jumps Over $71K as UK's FCA Lets Institutional Investors Create Crypto ETNs
item.dc:creator: Parikshit Mishra, Omkar Godbole
item.description: The leading cryptocurrency had crossed $70,000 for the first time ever last week.

item.title: Bitcoin Tentative, Asian Stocks Slide on BOJ Rate Hike Talks
item.dc:creator: Omkar Godbole
item.description: The BOJ has long been seen as a major source of uncertainty for financial markets, including cryptocurrencies.

item.title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Nears 200K BTC, Passing Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy
item.dc:creator: Helene Braun
item.description: In less than two months of existence, the BlackRock iShares Bitcoin ETF (IBIT) has accumulated more bitcoin {{BTC}} than the largest corporate holder, MicroStrategy (MSTR).
item.media:keywords: blackrock, IBIT, spot bitcoin etfs, Michael Taylor bitcoin, MicroStrategy bitcoin holdings

media:content.media:description: BlackRock's IBIT has accumulated more bitcoin than MicroStrategy. (CoinDesk)

item.dc:creator: Stephen Alpher
item.description: The activist investor has previously mostly steered clear of any involvement in crypto.

item.description: The mempool was a key part of its technology stack that nonetheless allowed for "sandwich" attacks.

item.title: Wyoming Grants DAOs New Legal Structure
item.dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
item.description: Wyoming has established a new legal framework for in-state decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) nonprofits that has crypto investment giant Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) calling the state an "oasis."

item.title: Appeals Court Revives Aspiring Class Action Lawsuit Against Binance
item.dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
item.description: A Friday ruling doesn't make any declaration on whether the tokens at the heart of a lawsuit against Binance are securities, but it may give investors a chance to argue that they are.

item.title: Meme Coin Frenzy Drives Ethereum Network Fees to Nearly 2-Year High: IntoTheBlock
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Ethereum network fees surged to nearly two-year highs, largely driven by the speculative frenzy with meme tokens such as PEPE, SHIB and FLOKI.
item.media:keywords: ethereum, meme coin, pepe, floki, ethereum fees

media:content.media:description: Dogecoin, a meme based on the shiba inu dog breed, was started as a joke in 2013. (Christal Yuen/Unsplash)

item.title: Crypto Investment Scam Losses in U.S. Grew 53% to $3.94B in 2023: FBI
item.dc:creator: Jamie Crawley
item.description: Investment fraud at large grew by 38% from $3.31 billion to $4.57 billion, according to the bureau's Internet Crime Report 2023, highlighting the prominent role that cryptocurrency plays in this area of crime.

item.dc:creator: Tracy Stephens
item.description: Bitcoin cash and ethereum classic also posted significant gains as all 20 cryptos in the gauge appreciated.

item.title: 'Groundhog Day' in Crypto as Bitcoin Again Plunges Following New Record
item.dc:creator: Krisztian Sandor
item.description: Bitcoin briefly rose above $70,000 Friday, but immediately tumbled to $67,000, repeating Tuesday's action.

item.title: Ether Hits $4K for First Time in More Than Two Years

item.title: Coinbase Upgraded to Neutral as Goldman Sachs Ends Bearish Stance
